definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Reconstruction windows were optimized to reduce motion artifacts.
sentences.chinese: 重建窗口最佳化以减少运动伪差。

sentences.english: The world-class IDM (Integrated Devicd Manufacturer) companies should optimize their resources attraction instead of investing too much.
sentences.chinese: 世界级的IDM公司应该要最佳化资源投入组合，。

sentences.english: Using this algorithm can simultaneously optimize the tuning of all PSSs in the power systems.
sentences.chinese: 所有稳定器的调整可借由此演算法同时给予最佳化。

sentences.english: In this way, we can regulate and optimize our sports work.
sentences.chinese: 从而对我们优育工作不断调整，不断最佳化。

sentences.english: Using this algorithm can optimize the output feedback gains of the stabilizers.
sentences.chinese: 稳定器的输出回馈增益值可借此演算法给予最佳化。

sentences.english: We should emphasize that the optimization process must take into account the fact .
sentences.chinese: 我们要强调指出，最佳化过程应考虑到这种事实。

sentences.english: Service quality is all about optimizing the effectiveness of human behavior.
sentences.chinese: 服务品质全部关于将人类行为的效力最佳化。

sentences.english: Hence it makes more sense to optimize for specific keywords.
sentences.chinese: 因此它制造较多的感觉为特定的牛鼻子字最佳化。

sentences.english: The steady high-output circuit optimizes the electricity utilizing efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 稳流高输出电路，最佳化电能利用效率。

pinyin: dian4 nao3 fu3 zhu4 she4 ji4
